views.markdown:
Supports iOS 11.0 to 11.4

Also available:

CallBar X for all iOS 11 iPhones!



Price: $3.99



- Complete call handling for Telephony and FaceTime audio calls, along with all other types of calls including Viber, WhatsApp, Skype etc, completely new UI,  easier to access with instant dismissal with just a left swipe and a whole new and complete dialer interface.

- CallBar re-designs the incoming call view to allow you to use your device while it's ringing or while in a call. Answer, decline or dismiss a call with ease without stopping what you're doing. You can pick up a call and stay where you are while in any application. Even place calls from anywhere by activating the dialer interface with an activation method of your choice.

- Several styles to customise appearance. Light, Dark, curved and Concept X , an iPhone X-like style that's been requested a lot so far.

- Supports all iPhones on iOS 11.

- Fixes activation issues - Fixes SpringBoard random freeze v0.3-48 - Adds option to disable CallBar X for outgoing calls. - Adds option to check for updates. - Adds option to automatically install updates. - Fixes an issue with Power Down view on iPhone X breaking BioProtect. v0.3-34 - Fixed a crash issue on iOS 11.0.x and some other devices when starting a call. - Changed FaceTime Video expanded mode to cover the whole screen. Tap on video view to hide controls, tap on CallBar X to collapse. - Fixed an issue where pressing the lock button while in a connected FaceTime Video call would cause a hang at lockscreen. - Fixed statusbar visibility in FaceTime Video Native UI. v0.3-14
- Fixed a crash issue on some devices when starting a call.
- Fixed an issue that was preventing the user to authenticate if CallBar X Dialer or a CallBar X managed call was active.
- Fixed an issue where user could tap on dialer buttons in a locked-device state, without having authenticated.
- Fixed an issue that was preventing the user to authenticate if CallBar X Dialer or a CallBar X managed call was active.
- Fixed an issue where user could tap on dialer buttons in a locked-device state, without having authenticated.


v0.3-4
- Fixed native UI background at lockscreen when Use At LockScreen is disabled
- Fixed CallBar X randomly disappearing when a notification banner is active
- Fixed AudioRecorder activation actions conflicting with CallBar X
- Fixed vibration on call connection for older devices


v0.2-97 - Current
- Fixed headset button not answering call.
- Added BioProtect Caller ID Protection compatibility
- Fixed buttons and labels position for devices with smaller screens (iPhone 5S, SE etc)
- Fixed lockscreen custom style not being selected after first respring at lockscreen.
- Added option to set audio control buttons appear always expanded (when possible)
- Enabled switching to native UI for Facetime Video.
- Fixed view style transition issues
- Fixed native ui to dismissal transition issues.
- Fixed right-to-left languages call duration alignment.


v0.2-2
- Fixed FaceTime Video collapsing randomly.
- Fixed Activator method not working.
- Fixed not being able to dismiss incoming call.
- Fixed AudioRecorder icon not appearing in CallBar X.
- Fixed vibration not working on devices older than 6S.
- Fixed randomly not being able to touch outside CallBar.
- Fixed random hangs.
- Fixed randomly missing UI.
- Fixed statusBar state not always adjusting to green/double height correctly.
- Fixed locking during call randomly not behaving correctly.
- Removed Cancel button when you bring up contact picker/phone controllers. Now you dismiss with home button/gesture.
- Fixed some image sizes in settings.
- Fixed several other reported issues.

- Added option to choose different styles and position at lockscreen and homescreen.
- Added ability to lively preview styles while in settings. Just switch styles while dialer or a call is active.
- Added a swipe-up to dismiss gesture when CallBar X is on top.
